description: A React component for editing and submitting notes, including form inputs for title, content, category, and tags, with handlers for submission and deletion.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React functional component for editing a note, handling form input state, and submitting or deleting notes.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, creates a NoteInput object from state, and invokes onSubmit callback.
